summary: AN ORDINANCE relating to housing discrimination; amending Seattle Municipal Code (SMC) Chapter 14.08 (Open Housing Ordinance 104839, as last amended by Ordinance 112903) to conform to similar provisions of SMC Chapter 14.04 (Fair Employment Practices Ordinance 109211, as last amended by Ordinance 112901) and amending SMC Sections 14.08.010, 14.08.020 and 14.08.120
